data.title: Portfolios – Página 4 – Creation
data.text:
SCOPE OF WORK: Integrated Campaign Advertising THE CLIENT: The relaunch campaign of Sagres brand in Cape Verde was based on local insight, which only makes sense for those living in the archipelago. It’s common to hear “Dá un Noiva” on the island’s cafeteria and tavern counters. What they refer to as “Noiva” (meaning: bride) means […]

SCOPE OF WORK: Brand Strategy Brand Identity Graphic Design Web Design Digital THE CLIENT: Being an expert in engineering means facing and overcoming all sorts of geographic and architectural challenges on a daily basis. A400 commitment to making their clients’ dreams come true is the way of pursuing their own dream of establishing new limits […]

SCOPE OF WORK: Naming Brand Strategy Brand Identity Development of Business Model Graphic Design Product Design THE CLIENT: Hellonext was a challenge we loved and embraced from the very beginning. We lead the way to position Hellonext in the electric mobility sector as an innovative and futuristic brand. Hellonext is about promoting a cleaner, simple, […]

SCOPE OF WORK: Graphic Design Packaging Integrated Campaign Advertising Point of Sale THE CLIENT: Teaming up with Medinfar Group means having to immerse in the culture of one of the biggest pharmaceuticals companies in Portugal. With a diversified portfolio of medicines, medical devices and healthcare products across several clinical areas, Medinfar Group pushed us to […]

SCOPE OF WORK: Brand Strategy Brand Identity Graphic Design Advertising Naming Integrated Campaign Social Media Digital Design Activation Copywriting THE CLIENT: We worked closely with Figueira da Foz Municipality helping to promote the city and the region internally and externally, as well as in other important projects for the municipality and the residents. SCOPE OF WORK: Brand Identity Brand Strategy Graphic Design Advertising Social Media Digital Event Design Editorial Product Design Equipment Design THE CLIENT: Petrotec is a real partner. Our teams are deeply engaged in the development of the marketing strategy, brand activations, digital communication, events organization, and industrial, graphic, and equipment design. SCOPE OF WORK: Brand Identity Brand Strategy Graphic Design Event Design THE CLIENT: Fashion does not necessarily need to be always associated with ephemerality or disruptive trends. Portugal Fashion branding strategy was focused on developing a timeless brand, conveying the permanent elements in each new collection, year after year. The visual identity is based on […]

SCOPE OF WORK: Brand Strategy Brand Identity Graphic Design Event Design Digital Social Media Integrated Campaign Advertising THE CLIENT: Aliança Seguros offers a comprehensive insurance portfolio, providing protection for the different sides of its customers’ lives. We’ve been working with Aliança for a few years now, projecting the brand awareness, communicating their products and supporting […]

SCOPE OF WORK: Brand Strategy Brand Identity Graphic Design Advertising Event Design Digital THE CLIENT: Creation partnered up with Paredes de Coura Municipality in several projects, contributing to build the positioning of the Municipality and to communicate some to its most important initiatives.
